name: Will the world end in 5 minutes?
name_original: Will the world end in 5 minutes?
description:
"Will the world end in 5 minutes" is a platformer where you can control a circle showing you the future version of the level. Move it around to reveal stuff that is only there in the future, or use it to cover up what is currently there in the present. You can also move time forwards and backwards within this circle. Use this to control the flow of objects in the future. Use this to do things such as make a falling panel fall up, down, or even remain stationary in the air.

Controls:

A - move left

D - move right

Spacebar - jump

Shift - show overlay of the future version of the level

R - respawn at previous checkpoint

Left mouse button - move time backwards

Right mouse button - move time forwards

Esc - pause game
